item.title: [j22] Demonic Gifts
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

item.title: [j22] Defy Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [j22] Deem Worthy
item.description:
Instant

Deem Worthy deals 7 damage to target creature.

Cycling {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Deem Worthy, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature.

item.title: [j22] Decree of Justice
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

item.title: [j22] Declare Dominance
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.

item.title: [j22] Death Wind
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Deathbringer Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [j22] Deathbloom Thallid
item.description:
Creature — Fungus

When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

item.title: [j22] Dead Weight
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

item.title: [j22] Deadbridge Goliath
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Daybreak Charger
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

When Daybreak Charger enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Daybreak Chaplain
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [j22] Dawn of Hope
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

item.title: [j22] Dawning Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Dawning Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

item.title: [j22] Danitha Capashen, Paragon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

First strike, vigilance, lifelink

Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [j22] Dance with Devils
item.description:
Instant

Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

item.title: [j22] Cyclops Electromancer
item.description:
Creature — Cyclops Wizard

When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [j22] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [j22] Cryptic Serpent
item.description:
Creature — Serpent

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

item.title: [j22] Cruel Sadist
item.description:
Creature — Human Assassin

{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Cruel Sadist.

{2}{B}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Cruel Sadist: It deals X damage to target creature.

item.title: [j22] Crow of Dark Tidings
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Bird

Flying

When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [j22] Crippling Chill
item.description:
Instant

Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Creeperhulk
item.description:
Creature — Plant Elemental

Trample

{1}{G}: Until end of turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness 5/5 and gains trample.

item.title: [j22] Crawling Sensation
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill two cards.

Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

item.title: [j22] Crashing Tide
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell has flash as long as you control a Merfolk.

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Courser of Kruphix
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Centaur

Play with the top card of your library revealed.

You may play lands from the top of your library.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Corpse Churn
item.description:
Instant

Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [j22] Consign to the Pit
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

item.title: [j22] Cone of Flame
item.description:
Sorcery

Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

item.title: [j22] Condescend
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [j22] Combat Professor
item.description:
Creature — Bird Cleric

Flying

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Colossal Majesty
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Colossal Dreadmaw
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

item.title: [j22] Cogwork Assembler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

{7}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [j22] Coalhauler Swine
item.description:
Creature — Boar Beast

Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.

item.title: [j22] Clockwork Hydra
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Hydra

Clockwork Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

Whenever Clockwork Hydra attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, Clockwork Hydra deals 1 damage to any target.

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Hydra.

item.title: [j22] Circuit Mender
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Insect

When Circuit Mender enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

When Circuit Mender leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Chilling Trap
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Chillerpillar
item.description:
Snow Creature — Insect

{4}{S}{S}: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

As long as Chillerpillar is monstrous, it has flying.

item.title: [j22] Chandra's Spitfire
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Chandra's Pyrohelix
item.description:
Instant

Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

item.title: [j22] Chandra's Pyreling
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Lizard

Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [j22] Chandra's Magmutt
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Dog

{T}: Chandra's Magmutt deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [j22] Chandra, Flame's Fury
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Chandra

+1: Chandra, Flame's Fury deals 2 damage to any target.

−2: Chandra, Flame's Fury deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

−8: Chandra, Flame's Fury deals 10 damage to target player and each creature that player controls.

item.title: [j22] Challenger Troll
item.description:
Creature — Troll

Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

item.title: [j22] Certain Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [j22] Cemetery Recruitment
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Cellar Door
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Target player puts the bottom card of their library into their graveyard. If it's a creature card, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [j22] Cavalry Drillmaster
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

item.title: [j22] Caustic Caterpillar
item.description:
Creature — Insect

{1}{G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
